name: Bajam Beat! Rhythm Game
description:
Hit and play to the beat of the drums with BaJam! Earn as much points as you can every time you hit the coins inside the rings and at the right beat. Be careful not to confuse the coins with plastic coins or else the game is over!

Features of Bajam:
⦁ Free to play
⦁ Share your high scores to your friends via social media
⦁ Know who’s leading among your friends
⦁ Take on the challenge as your difficulty level increases as you go
⦁ Multiply your points every time you hit the coins perfectly inside the glowing rings

We’d love to hear about your experience with BaJam! Kindly leave us a review and comment below.
Visit our website to know more: https://thinkbitsolutions.com/
